TestMod:Lumo.NAME: Lumo
MOVES: #yLumo will deal #bD damage to random enemy.
#yLumo will deal #bD damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.
#yLumo will deal #bD damage to ALL enemies.
DIALOG: Enemies will attack #yLumo first, and the #yBlock you gain will be given to #yLumo. NL You will receive #b3 damage when #yLumo dies.
